info.brief_description: This story will follow a very intelligent 10 year old named Sarah, who becomes diapered.
info.description:
Sarah is a very intelligent 10 year old girl, she stands 4 feet tall has medium length blonde hair and loves the color purple. She lives in a quiet neighborhood miles outside of town with her Dad Mike and step mom Cindy. Sarah has skipped a couple grades is currently in 6th grade in middle school. Her favorite subject is science, to the point of her having a small lab in the basement that her dad had built for her. She wants to be a scientist just like her father, and hes very proud of her.
Cindy on the other hand would prefer having a more normal child but loves Sarah like her own anyway.

It's a typical Thursday afternoon Sarah just got home from school about an hour ago, shes slightly upset about being bullied in school her nickname is "baby genius". Shes completed her homework and is currently working in the lab when her father knocks and the door and walks in.

He wants to talk about...
